items.title: Why you should add authorized users on the Capital One Venture X
items.description: The Capital One Venture X provides some of the most generous benefits to authorized users — from lounge access to complimentary Hertz elite status.

items.title: Act fast: Marriott Bonvoy members can save up to 25% on fall stays
items.description: Book by Sept. 14 to save at participating Marriott hotels worldwide.

items.title: New user-friendly tool lets you easily transfer Avios between all 7 airline programs
items.description: Avios has relaunched its much-improved Transfer Avios page with direct moves between Iberia, Aer Lingus, Vueling, Loganair, and other partner programs...

items.title: I pay for Apple Music and Spotify — soon, I'll get both for the price of one thanks to this card
items.description: I'm counting down the days until I can access the complimentary Apple Music subscription on my Chase Sapphire Reserve.

items.title: Chase Freedom Q3 categories: Last chance to activate
items.description: You won't want to miss out on a single point — or cent of cash back — on your spending. Here's how to activate your Chase Freedom and Freedom Flex 5% ...
